name: Play with Anna
description:
Anna made a game for you, would you play it?

A game fully made in paint.

Note: Don't make Anna mad... Focus on her game.

• Made using GDevelop 5 Engine
• 2d game
• Horror/jumpscare game
• The game contains a lot of jumpscares, loud sounds, blood, human body parts, and overall creepiness.
• Installing the game using "Play with Anna Installer.exe" windows may warn you that the file is a virus, click ignore.



• Enter - Start the conversation
• Arrows UP - Snake up
• Arrows Down - Snake down
• Arrows Left - Snake left
• Arrows Right - Snake right
